refnamediv.refpurpose: Generate a visualization graph of a manifest

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The command disnix-visualize generates a graph showing services (as nodes), inter-dependencies (as arrows) and target machines (as clusters) from a manifest file generated by disnix-manifest. The graph is exported as dot format, which can be transformed in a raster image format by using the dot command.

listitem.para: Shows the usage of this command to the user.
